subject: Writing
title: Instagram Poets: Poetry Goes Viral
description: A quick win: understand Instagram Poets: Poetry Goes Viral.

hook.text: Rupi Kaur's milk and honey sold 3 million copies. She built her audience on Instagram, not in bookstores.

buildup.text: Instagram poets write short, accessible verse paired with simple illustrations and share them as images.

discovery.text: Their poems reach millions who never enter a library â€” poetry found a new audience through scrolling.

twist.text: Literary critics dismiss Instapoetry as shallow. Fans say it's the first poetry that speaks their language.

climax.text: Whether it's great literature or not, Instapoetry made poetry commercially viable for the first time in decades.

punchline.text: Poetry went viral, and gatekeepers lost control.

quiz.question: What platform did Rupi Kaur use to build her poetry audience?
